bibl.title: P. Oxy. 2463: Lycophron and Callimachus.
bibl.note: Concludes that P. Oxy. XXVII, 2463 (= Pack2 2861) contains remnants of a commentary on the Aitia of Callimachus. Identifying the commentary makes it possible to reconstruct the missing part of Heracles' conversation with Molorchus (Suppl. Hell. 256-7), confirming its place in the Victoria Berenices.
bibl.seg: Livrea Enrico, P. Oxy. 2463: Lycophron and Callimachus.

Concludes that P. Oxy. XXVII, 2463 (= Pack2 2861) contains remnants of a commentary on the Aitia of Callimachus. Identifying the commentary makes it possible to reconstruct the missing part of Heracles' conversation with Molorchus (Suppl. Hell. 256-7), confirming its place in the Victoria Berenices.
